abstract: Three top executives of Sprint Nextel resigned from the board of its Clearwire venture, stoking speculation it would pave the way for a wholesale deal or equity stake sale to T-Mobile USA.
snippet: Three top executives of Sprint Nextel resigned from the board of its Clearwire venture, stoking speculation it would pave the way for a wholesale deal or equity stake sale to T-Mobile USA.
lead_paragraph: Three top executives of Sprint Nextel resigned from the board of its Clearwire venture, stoking speculation it would pave the way for a wholesale deal or equity stake sale to T-Mobile USA, Reuters reported.

abstract: Adam Miller, the president of public-relations firm Abernathy MacGregor Group, is joining Comcast as a senior adviser.
snippet: Adam Miller, the president of public-relations firm Abernathy MacGregor Group, is joining Comcast as a senior adviser.
lead_paragraph: Adam Miller, the president of the public-relations firm Abernathy MacGregor Group, has advised companies on hundreds of mergers and acqusitions over his 16-year career. On Friday Mr. Miller struck his own deal.
